data.title: Jefferies
data.meta_description: Main Function Jefferies is seeking a Senior Associate for its Business Services Equity Research team which covers the environmental services, diversified services, and employment services sectors. Responsibilities - Building and maintaining financial models and industry databases insuring correct and up-to-date information for research reports that are distributed to internal/external clients - Work closely with Senior Analyst to write company reports, monthly/weekly publications and coverage initiation reports - Help lead research content idea generation for future reports, client engagement - Review business and trade publications, annual reports, financial filings and other sources in order to gather, synthesize and interpret data on companies related to the coverage universe - Develop marketing materials for clients, meet with management teams of companies and attend industry conferences where appropriate - Over time, the associate will also be responsible for communicat...
